alert.note: Alert for Cowley; Harvey; McPherson; Reno; Sedgwick; Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 9:02PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern McPherson, southwestern Cowley, eastern Reno, Sedgwick, Harvey and Sumner Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 902 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Buhler to near Colwich to near South Haven. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Hutchinson, Derby, Newton, Haysville, Wellington, Park City, Valley Center, Bel Aire, Mulvane, Goddard, Hesston, Maize, Clearwater, Halstead, North Newton, Moundridge, Sedgwick, Belle Plaine and Inman. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 0 and 32, and between Mile Markers 34 and 58. Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 1 and 49. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cowley; Harvey; McPherson; Reno; Sedgwick; Sumner
